HomePage.description: We offer advanced solutions in telecommunications, IT, construction, and consulting. With us, the infrastructure of the future is built today

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are?
whoWeAre.description: We are a group of rapidly growing companies operating in various sectors of Azerbaijan and creating lasting value.We provide services in various fields such as telecommunications infrastructure development, information technology, construction, finance, and consulting.By following global trends, we adapt advanced technologies to the local market and offer practical, reliable, and innovative solutions to both the public and private sectors
whoWeAre.missionDetail: Alongside increasing the efficiency and effectiveness of our partner companies, we also contribute to ensuring transparency in their operations.We believe that digitalization and proper management are the keys to the future. With this approach, AzTelco Group offers systematic, ethical, and technology-driven services that create value for all its partner
whoWeAre.visionDetail: To be a leading company in the development of technological infrastructure in Azerbaijan and the region, meeting international standards and promoting innovation. Our vision is to stay aligned with global trends and create reliable, sustainable value for our partners.

ourServices.servicesDescription: Aztelco Group offers innovative services across various fields. We apply strategic and professional approaches to every project
ourServices.telecommunicationServices: Construction and Operation of Telecommunication Infrastructure
ourServices.telecommunicationServicesDetail1: Design and installation of telecommunication lines
ourServices.telecommunicationServicesDetail2: Construction and operation of data base stations
ourServices.digitalServicesDetail1: IT equipment licensing, software sales and installation
ourServices.digitalServicesDetail2: Setup and management of a digital advertising platform
ourServices.constructionServicesDetail: Aztelco Group has extensive experience in planning, managing, and executing infrastructure projects. We implement railway and other strategic construction projects in accordance with international standards. Quality and sustainability in construction are our main goals.
ourServices.financeServicesDetail: We provide financial and management services that support sustainable business development. Through budgeting, financial planning, analytical reporting, and control mechanisms, we help enterprises improve operational efficiency.
ourServices.ITsolutionsServicesDetail1: Development of IT strategy and implementation of digital transformation
ourServices.ITsolutionsServicesDetail2: Selection, implementation, and management of ERP systems
ourServices.consltingServicesDetail: We provide strategic consulting services for the public and private sectors. Our expert team supports project management, legal and financial analysis, and risk assessment. Our goal is to help our partners make better decisions.
ourServices.consultingServicesDetail1: Provision of financial and accounting services
ourServices.consultingServicesDetail3: Strategic approaches and operational support in human resources

CareersPage.name: Your name

CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail1: Higher or secondary technical education (IT, Computer Engineering, or related fields);
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail2: Knowledge of network fundamentals (TCP/IP, LAN/WAN, DHCP, DNS, NAT, VLAN, etc.);
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail3: Basic understanding of the following technologies:
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail5: Basic knowledge of Windows and Linux operating systems;
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail6: Initial experience in network configuration and troubleshooting in operating systems;
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail7: Ability to work with IT equipment (router, switch, modem, access point, etc.);
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail8: Ability to work in a team and solve problems;
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail9: Ability to work with technical documents and prepare reports;
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail10: Fluent in Azerbaijani, technical level of English is desirable;
CareersMockData1.vacancyDetail11: Possession of CCNA or similar international certificates is an advantage (but not required);
CareersMockData1.responsibilities1: Ensure uninterrupted operation of the local network within the company;
CareersMockData1.responsibilities2: Diagnose malfunctions and provide initial technical support;
CareersMockData1.responsibilities3: Connect new users to the network and perform configuration tasks;
CareersMockData1.responsibilities4: Monitor and manage network equipment; Cisco, MikroTik, Ubiquiti equipment;
CareersMockData1.responsibilities5: Prepare technical documents and maintain records;
CareersMockData1.responsibilities6: Participate in other projects together with the IT team.

CareersMockData2.vacancyDesc: 1 employee, for the development of the ERP project and improvement of existing 1C modules
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail1: Higher education (Information Technology, Mathematics, Economics, or related fields);
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail2: Minimum 3-5 years of experience on the 1C:Enterprise 8.3 platform;
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail3: Deep knowledge and experience in modules such as accounting, warehouse, trade, payroll (УПП, ERP, Бухгалтерия, ЗУП, etc.);
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail4: Ability to modify and rewrite 1C configurations;
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail5: Understanding of database structures and ability to work with SQL queries (MSSQL, PostgreSQL, etc.);
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail6: Ability to gather requirements, prepare technical specifications, and implement them;
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail7: Experience integrating with REST and SOAP APIs;
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail9: Experience working with Git or other version control systems;
CareersMockData2.vacancyDetail10: Fluent in Azerbaijani, knowledge of Russian and technical English is an advantage;
CareersMockData2.responsibilities2: Design, develop, and implement new modules;
CareersMockData2.responsibilities3: Prepare and implement technical specifications based on user requirements;
CareersMockData2.responsibilities4: Coordinate with various departments to identify needs;
CareersMockData2.responsibilities5: Integrate 1C systems with other software (e.g., CRM, banking systems, web services, etc.);
CareersMockData2.responsibilities6: Support during data migration and system updates;
CareersMockData2.responsibilities7: Mentor and provide technical support to junior developers;
CareersMockData2.responsibilities8: Prepare technical documentation and maintain system documentation.

CareersMockData3.vacancyDesc: 1 employee to support the team in social media and web content management
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail1: Higher or secondary specialized education (Marketing, PR, Journalism, IT, or related fields);
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail2: Ability to work with social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.);
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail3: Ability to make simple changes and upload content using WordPress or other CMS systems;
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail4: Creative thinking and a sense of visual aesthetics;
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail5: Proper writing and expression skills in Azerbaijani; knowledge of Russian and English is an advantage;
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail6: Ability to use simple design tools such as Canva, Photoshop, etc. is desirable;
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail7: Ability to perform tasks on time and in a systematic manner;
CareersMockData3.vacancyDetail8: Ability to work in a team and manage multiple tasks simultaneously;
CareersMockData3.responsibilities1: Updating content on websites of group companies and coordinating with the technical support team;
CareersMockData3.responsibilities2: Participating in the preparation of weekly/monthly content plans for social media accounts;
CareersMockData3.responsibilities3: Timely posting, scheduling content, and engaging with followers (DMs, comments, etc.);
CareersMockData3.responsibilities4: Creating simple designs (stories, post templates, etc.);
CareersMockData3.responsibilities5: Preparing simple reports on social media analytics and website traffic;
CareersMockData3.responsibilities6: Translating, editing, and optimizing content for SEO;
CareersMockData3.responsibilities7: Creating and sharing timely posts related to events, campaigns, and updates;
CareersMockData3.responsibilities8: Close collaboration with other marketing and design teams.
